author: AP
title: Pandemic forcing NBA players to work out with what's on hand
description: Giannis Antetokounmpo is spending much of his time during the coronavirus-imposed hiatus working out,
content:
MILWAUKEE (AP) — Giannis Antetokounmpo is spending much of his time during the coronavirus-imposed hiatus working out, helping care for his newborn son and playing occasional video games.
What the reigning MVP isn’t doing very often is shooting baskets since… [+2890 chars]
